title: Irredeemable, Vol. 3
description: Legendary comic writer Mark (KINGDOM COME) Waid takes superhero comics to the next level asking the question, "What if the world's greatest superhero decided to become the world's greatest super-villain?" A "twilight of the superheroes"-style story that examines super-villains from the writer of KINGDOM COME and EMPIRE!Collects issues #9â€“12
author: Mark Waid
